programme.title: Näitlev õppevahend
Nenagljadnoje posobie
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.

programme.title: Lumemees ja lumekoer
The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: Raymond Briggsi lasteraamatul tuginev animafilm on elav ja pealtnäha lihtsakoeline lugu lumemehe ning ta kaaslase seiklustest... Joonistused ja sellega harmoneeruv muusika on aga filmist teinud kõigi jõuluprogrammide pärli. Ilma dialoogita lastelugu on nauditavalt vanamoeline ja klassikaline.

programme.title: Lumekassid ja mina
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan naaseb Venemaale, et aidata bioloog Viktor Lukarevskil õpetada ilveseid vabas looduses toime tulema. Üks vabastatud paar, Koška ja Mjass, üllatas Lukarevskit kahe vastsündinud pojaga. Lisaks täiskasvanud loomadele tuleb nüüd ette valmistada ka pisikesed Ivan ja Aljona. Gordon püüab õpetada Brjanskit, keda peeti kodus lemmikloomana ja kes ei oska ise saaki jahtida.

programme.title: Salme viikingid
programme.desc: Dokumentaalsarja viimases osas räägime võimalikest teooriatest, mis Saaremaal, Salme külas 1300 aastat tagasi juhtuda võis ning mille tagajärjel need 41 viikingit koos laevade ja uhkete panustega maapõue sängitati. Asjale lisab vürtsi viikingiaja spetsialist Marika Mägi, kellel on juhtunust oma nägemus, mis teiste teooriatega täiesti vastuollu läheb. Režissöör Liis Lindmaa, toimetaja Sigrid Salutee, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja ULM Production.

programme.title: Seenelkäik
programme.desc: Poliitik Aadu Kägu sõidab koos abikaasa Viiviga metsa seenele, et mainekampaaniast närve puhata. Nendega liitub juhuslik hääletaja, rahatu rokitäht Zäk, kes on jäänud peale suvetuuri Eestimaa kolgastesse tolknema. Vältides rahvarohkeid seenemetsi, kihutab seltskond umbropsu kuhugi pärapõrgusse, mis paistab metsik ja inimtühi. Samal ajal, kui kolmik avastab end metsa eksinuna, lahvatab meediaskandaal. Uuriv ajakirjandus kahtlustab, et poliitik Kägu on isiklikuks otstarbeks kuritarvitanud riigi raha. Algab võitlus au, elu ja surma peale nii metsas kui ka linnas. Stsenarist ja režissöör Toomas Hussar, produtsent Piret Tibbo-Hudgins, operaator Rein Kotov, kunstnik Kristina Lõuk, kostüümikunstnik Eva-Maria Gramakovski, helilooja Arian Levin, monteerija Tambet Tasuja, helirežissöör Ivo Felt. Osades Raivo E. Tamm, Juhan Ulfsak, Elina Reinold, Üllar Saaremäe, Hendrik Toompere jr jr, Hilje Murel, Elmo Nüganen, Mari-Liis Lill. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.

programme.title: Adele. Ainult ühel õhtul
Adele One Night Only
programme.desc: Popmuusika supertäht Adele esitab kuueaastase pausi järel uusi lugusid ja vanu lemmikuid. Lisaks kuuleme Oprah Winfrey eksklusiivintervjuud lauljannaga tema uuest albumist, lugudest laulude taga, elust pärast lahutust, kaalulangetamisest ja poja kasvatamisest.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Arktika suvi hakkab lõppema ja viimaseid sooje päevi tuleb võimalikult hästi ära kasutada. Jessie Holmes püüab end sisse seada nii mugavalt kui saab. Sue Aikens võtab ette vee äravoolu süsteemi, et vältida tulevasi üleujutusi. Ricko püüab esivanemate maad paremini tundma õppida. Hailstone'id jäävad veeteedel hätta.

programme.title: Burattino
A. Tolstoi/E. Nüganen
programme.desc: Aleksei Tolstoi muinasloost sündinud hoogne lugu uudishimulikust puupoisist, kes satub lustakatesse seiklustesse. Nimiosas mängib Priit Võigemast, kuid etenduses osaleb ka kogu EMTA Lavakunstikooli 20. lend. Lavastas kursuse juhendaja Elmo Nüganen, kunstnik Jelena Girlin, helilooja ja klaveriõpetaja Olav Ehala, lauluõpetaja Riina Roose, laulusõnad kirjutas Juhan Viiding. Telesalvestuse režissöör Elo Selirand, assistent Kadi Katarina Priske, juhtoperaator Janno-Hans Arro.

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Maria Soomets. Äpu laul. Saatest Laulukarussell 2012

programme.title: Tagasi Prostokvašinos
programme.desc: Vana-aastaõhtu on käes, ema ja isa oodatakse juba pikisilmi Prostokvašinosse, et koos uut aastat vastu võtta.

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Alika Milova ja Ithaka Maria. Hopa'pa-rei!

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Martinil on nüüd kolm erinevat häält, ta käib seetõttu jälle arsti juures. Dr Wangel arvab, et imelikku häält põhjustab armukadedus.

programme.title: 12 kuud
Dvenadtsat mesjatsev
programme.desc: Samuil Maršaki uusaasta-muinasjutt vaeslapsest, kelle kuri võõrasema saadab südatalvel metsa lumikellukesi otsima ja sellest, kuidas südi tüdruk kohtub kõigi 12 kuuga, kes teda aitavad.

programme.title: Talv Prostokvašinos
Zima v Prostokvašino
programme.desc: Joonisfilmid Onu Fjodori, kass Matroskini ja koer Šariku ning postiljon Petškini tegemistest on kindlalt vene multifilmi kullavaramus. Eduard Uspenski raamatu „Onu Fjodor, kass ja koer“ ja tema originaalkäsikirjade ainetel vändatud Prostokvašino multifilmisarja kolmas lugu aastast 1984. Isa ja Onu Fjodor sõidavad Prostokvašinosse külla Šarikule ning Matroskinile, et üheskoos uut aastat vastu võtta.

programme.title: Isamaa pääsukesed
programme.desc: Eesti Draamateatri ja Nargenfestivali ühistöö "Isamaa pääsukesed" räägib loo sellest, kuidas näitering "Virmaline" otsustab tuua lavale Vabadussõjale pühendatud muusikali. Paraku nii nagu omal ajal ei viitsinud paljud mehed sõtta minna, on nüüd neid pea võimatu näitemängu meelitada. Lavastus kuulub EV100 teatrisarja "Sajandi lugu". Autor Andrus Kivirähk, lavastaja Priit Pedajas, kunstnik Pille Jänes, muusikalised kujundajad Tõnu Kaljuste ja Tõnis Kõrvits. Osades Ülle Kaljuste, Marta Laan, Viire Valdma, Maria Klenskaja, Ester Pajusoo, Teele Pärn, Tiit Sukk, Christopher Rajaveer, Tõnu Oja, Taavi Teplenkov, Tõnu Kark, Karmo Nigula. Salvestuse režissöör Eva-Katarina Taimre, juhtoperaator Raul Priks, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Kilpkonnamuna omlett. Mis sellest saab ja kas üldse saab. Arutame saapaasju. Kergekujuline kuumarabandus. Metsaloodusemees Romet Vaino ja tema teistsugune vaade loodusele. Ebamaine kogemus Nõmbra suitsusauna, lillevanni ja metsarestoraniga. Lisaks looduse ja matkatarkusi ning palju muud. Operaatorid Manuel Mägi ja Lemo, sarja autor Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.

programme.title: Andrea Bocelli: Armastus Portofinos
Andrea Bocelli- Love in Portofino
programme.desc: Maailma kõige armastatum tenor maailma kõige romantilisemate lauludega maailma kõige kaunimal areenil. Kontserdil Itaalia maalilises Portofino sadamas esitab Andrea Bocelli kuulsaid armastuslaule, toeks säravate talentide ansambel: Caroline Campbell (viiul), Helene Fischer ja Brasiilia staar Sandy (vokaal), Chris Botti (trompet) ja ka Bocelli kihlatu Veronica Berti (vokaal).

programme.title: Ei mingit peenutsemist. Diana Kennedy
Nothing Fancy: Diana Kennedy
programme.desc: Elizabeth Carrolli mitmeid auhindu pälvinud biograafiline dokumentaalfilm väsimatust ja kirglikust 94-aastasest toidukirjanikust ning Inglismaal tegutsevast legendaarsest Mehhiko köögi eksperdist, kes ise nimetab end bravuurikalt Mehhiko köögi Mick Jaggeriks.

programme.title: Jüri Rumm
programme.desc: Romantilis-ajaloolise seiklusfilmi tegevus toimub Eestimaal 1880. aastate lõpus. Filmisüžee aluseks on heroiseeritud hobusevaras Jüri Rumm oma armastus- ja seikluslugudega. Filmi peategelase prototüüp Jüri Rummo sündis 1856. aastal Kehtna vallas. Pärast seda, kui ta noorukina teenis leiba Kehtna mõisa toapoisina, sai temast juhuse tahtel varas, siis hobusevaras, siis röövel ja lõpuks lihtsalt kurjategija. Vahel jagas ta varastatud kraami heldelt ka vaesematele inimestele, sellest sai alguse tema kuulsus Eesti Robin Hoodina, Rinaldo Rinaldinina või Stenka Razinina - kõik legendaarsed kurjategijad. Nimiosas Hannes Kaljujärv, teised osatäitjad Marian Wolf, Merle Palmiste, Katariina Lauk, Kaljo Kiisk, Rein Oja, Marko Matvere, Peeter Kard, Mari Lill, Dan Põldroos jpt. Režissöör Jaan Kolberg, stsenaristid Andres Ehin, Kalle Käsper ja Eduard Volodarski, peaoperaator Rein Kotov, lavastuskunstnik Ervin Õunapuu.

programme.title: Ain Anger. Juubeligala kodusaarel
programme.desc: Maailmakuulus ooperilaulja Ain Anger tähistas suurejoonelise galaga oma 50. juubelit Saaremaa ooperipäevadel. ERSO saatel kõlasid maailmakuulsad aariad ja kodusaare publik sai nautida koos Ainiga ka noorema põlvkonna parimaid naislauljaid - Monika-Evelin Liivi, Aile Asszonyt ja Mirjam Mesakut ning bassidest sõpru Pavlo Balakinit ja Egils Siliņšit. Režissöör Erle Veber, produtsendid Rait Roland Veskemaa ja Karmel Killandi.

programme.title: Jää valitseja
Ledus Pavelnieks
programme.desc: Kui lossi saabub jää valitseja, peab kuningas teda eksikombel naljameheks ja naerab tema üle kogu südamest. Karistus ei jää aga tulemata ja olukorrale peavad lahenduse leidma pere kõige nooremad.

programme.title: Väikevend ja Karlsson
Malõš i Karlson
programme.desc: Ühel tavapärasel õhtupoolikul igavleb Väikevend oma toas, kui aknast lendab sisse mees parimais aastais - Karlsson, kes elab katusel. Nüüd on üks asi kindel - selles sõpruses igavusele enam kohta ei ole. Vene multifilmiklassika Astrid Lindgreni jutustuste põhjal.

programme.title: Karlsson tuleb tagasi
Karlson vernulsja
programme.desc: Astrid Lindgreni lugu läheb edasi päevast, kui Väikevennale saabub seltsiks preili Sokk, kes on aus ja lisaks hea iseloomuga ning kes armastab lapsi meeletult! Sündmustele annab hoopis teise hoo Karlsson katuselt! Vene animafilmi klassika on dubleerinud Tallinnfilm.

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Dr Wangel soovitab Martinil Delia unustada, kuid see pole nii lihtne. Samal ajal on talgupäev ja Martin peab hoidma perekonna au.

programme.title: Kapten Morten lollide laeval
programme.desc: Morten on uudishimulik ja leidlik poiss. Saatuse tahtel on ta sunnitud elama koos kasuvanematega, kes ei näe tema loovas tegevuses muud kui pahatahtlikku huligaanitsemist. Emata Morten ei ole siiski orb, ta isa on kapten, kes töö tõttu peab suurema osa ajast merel viibima. Morten soovib isa eeskujul samuti kapten olla ja ehitab endale mängulaeva, mille mehitab erinevate putukatega. Unenäoline paralleelmaailm kirjeldab Morteni elu groteskses võtmes. Mingil hetkel maailmad segunevad - nii Morteni päris kui ka fantaasiamaailm ähvardavad kokku kukkuda. Mõlema maailma päästmiseks on vaja julgelt tegutseda. Morteni kindlameelse tegutsemise taga on põhimõte – kapten ei jäta kunagi oma laeva. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.

programme.title: Maša ja karu
programme.sub-title: Üks ja kaks ja kuus, sütti, nääripuu!

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Sirle Allikivi ja Kaire Vilgats. Halleluja

programme.title: Sipsiku laulud
programme.desc: Sipsiku film on juba paljude perede lemmik. Filmis kõlas aga ka hulk lahedaid laule, mõned neist filmi ei mahtunud ja osa kirjutati suisa juurde, et saaks kõlada suurepärane Sipsiku laulude kontsert. Üles astuvad Ewert Sundja bändiga, Jan Uuspõld, Elo-Mirt Oja, Eliise Mööl, Piret Krumm, Elisabet Reinsalu ja Ott Sepp.

programme.title: Üksindus ühenduses
The Great Disconnect
programme.desc: Nüüdisaega on kirjeldatud suure üksinduse ajastuna. Hoolimata edusammudest tehnoloogias, elutingimustes, hariduses ja tervishoius, on inimesed ühiskonnana lahku kasvanud ja see leiab väljenduse tervisekriisis, mis hõlmab kõiki vanuseid, sugusid, rasse ning kultuure. Terviseekspert Tamer Soliman uurib oma ala asjatundjatelt, mis on eraldatuse peamised põhjused ja mida saaks ette võtta.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: Pandeemia tähe all lõppev aasta on olnud keeruline ka meie lätlastest lõunanaabritele. Millist tuge annavad 2021. aasta mõtestamiseks pikk elukogemus, teadmised psühholoogiast ja rahvalaulud päikesest? "Plekktrummi" aastalõpuvestlus toimub Riias, kus külaliseks on rahvalaulude uurija, teadlane ja Läti Vabariigi endine president Vaira Vīķe-Freiberga. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Hedi Rosma, juhtoperaator Meelis Mikker, režissöör Maire Radsin, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.title: Ain Anger. Juubeligala kodusaarel
programme.desc: Maailmakuulus ooperilaulja Ain Anger tähistas suurejoonelise galaga oma 50. juubelit Saaremaa ooperipäevadel. ERSO saatel kõlasid maailmakuulsad aariad ja kodusaare publik sai nautida koos Ainiga ka noorema põlvkonna parimaid naislauljaid - Monika-Evelin Liivi, Aile Asszonyt ja Mirjam Mesakut ning bassidest sõpru Pavlo Balakinit ja Egils Siliņšit. Režissöör Erle Veber, produtsendid Rait Roland Veskemaa ja Karmel Killandi.

programme.title: Kihnu lapsed
Rasmus, kormonaudid ning ..
programme.desc: Väike kihnu poiss Rasmus on mures kodusaarestikul toimuva pärast. Mustad linnud, keda kihnu keeles kutsutakse kormonautideks, on vallutanud ümbritsevad laiud ja kihutanud sealt minema teised sulelised. Ka kosklaid, kes olid varem kihnlaste majasõbrad, on looduses oluliselt vähemaks jäänud. Nende peamisteks vaenlasteks nii Kihnus kui ka Manijal on varesed. Koos vanaisa Jukuga, venna Raimondi ja naabritüdruk Engeliga, aga ka saarevaht Arvoga töötab Rasmus selle nimel, et Kihnu saarestiku linnuriigis oleks kõigil võimalus pesitseda ning poegi kasvatada. Filmi autor Mark Soosaar. Tootja Weiko Saawa Film.

programme.title: Laanetaguse suvi
programme.desc: Pooleldi tõsielufilm neljast poisist ja nende kasvandikest - kahest hundikutsikast, sookurest, metskitsetallest. Mis saab olendist, kelle sa oled võtnud oma hoolde? Kes vastutab tema käekäigu eest, kui maailm enam ei mahu su sülle varju ja sooja? Käsikiri, teostus ja pilt Rein Maran. Mängivad Fred Jüssi, Anne Maasik, Enn Pinsel, Mihkel Pinsel, Riho Rosberg, Hannes Kase, Hillar Pärjasaar ja Pauliine Tuut.

programme.title: Supilinna Salaselts
programme.desc: Seiklusliku koguperefilmi tegevustik leiab aset suvises Tartus. Mari, Sadu, Olav ja Anton on neli Supilinna last, kelle rõõmus argipäev pööratakse pea peale, kui nende kodulinna tabab salapärane mürgitus, mis pooled linna täiskasvanud lasteks muudab. Lastel on lahenduse leidmiseks aega vaid 48 tundi. Algab peadpööritav seiklus, mis viib lapsed kõige ootamatumatesse paikadesse nii maa peal kui ka maa all. Tänase kodulinna kõrval õpivad nad tundma ühte teist, aastatetagust Tartut, teejuhiks Mari vanaisa käest saadud märkmik salapäraste vihjetega. "Supilinna Salaselts" on armastatud lastekirjaniku Mika Keräneni ülipopulaarsetel lasteraamatutel põhinev kogupereseiklus, kus vanemad ja lapsed rollid ära vahetavad.

programme.title: Teofrastus
programme.desc: Läbi kassi silmade räägitud lugu vabadusest ja kaastundest, mis leiab aset 1980ndate Eestis. Kass Teofrastus elab üksi Peedu rongijaamas, kui ühel päeval pakub kaastundlik rongisõitja talle enda juures kodu ja perekonda. Kuid hea elu maamajas ei kesta kaua. Pererahvas peab minema linna, kus ühel saatuslikul päeval satub Teofrastus tänavale. Kas ta leiab tagasitee õnneni?

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Dr Wangel soovitab Martinil Delia unustada, kuid see pole nii lihtne. Samal ajal on talgupäev ja Martin peab hoidma perekonna au.

programme.title: Väikevend ja Karlsson
Malõš i Karlson
programme.desc: Ühel tavapärasel õhtupoolikul igavleb Väikevend oma toas, kui aknast lendab sisse mees parimais aastais - Karlsson, kes elab katusel. Nüüd on üks asi kindel - selles sõpruses igavusele enam kohta ei ole. Vene multifilmiklassika Astrid Lindgreni jutustuste põhjal.

programme.title: Karlsson tuleb tagasi
Karlson vernulsja
programme.desc: Astrid Lindgreni lugu läheb edasi päevast, kui Väikevennale saabub seltsiks preili Sokk, kes on aus ja lisaks hea iseloomuga ning kes armastab lapsi meeletult! Sündmustele annab hoopis teise hoo Karlsson katuselt! Vene animafilmi klassika on dubleerinud Tallinnfilm.

programme.title: Lumemees ja lumekoer
The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: Raymond Briggsi lasteraamatul tuginev animafilm on elav ja pealtnäha lihtsakoeline lugu lumemehe ning ta kaaslase seiklustest... Joonistused ja sellega harmoneeruv muusika on aga filmist teinud kõigi jõuluprogrammide pärli. Ilma dialoogita lastelugu on nauditavalt vanamoeline ja klassikaline.

programme.title: Näitleja
programme.sub-title: Kaunimad aastad, kuu Kaljukitses. Hannes Kaljujärv
programme.desc: Portreesaade ühest musikaalsest, andekast ja mehisest näitlejast. Näeme katkendeid tema paljudest Vanemuise teatri lavarollidest ja esinemistest. Autor ja režissöör Gerda Kordemets, operaator Peep Kasesalu, helirežissöör Ivar Nurmsalu, toimetaja Anne Tuuling.

programme.title: Undiin
programme.desc: Jean Giraudoux näidendi kolmes vaatuses lavastas Vanemuises Ain Mäeots, prantsuse keelest tõlkis Marike Tammet, muusikaliselt kujundasid Ain Mäeots ja Toomas Lunge ning kunstnikud on Aime Unt ja Liina Unt. Osades: Liina Olmaru (Undiin), Hannes Kaljujärv (Rüütel Hans), Piret Rauk (Bertha) jpt. Režissöör Karin Nurm.

programme.title: Tähelaev
programme.desc: Näitleja Hannes Kaljujärv kui diplomeeritud spordimetoodik räägib oma näitlejatööst nagu kõrgushüppest - ehkki latt on kord kõrgemal, kord madalamal, on varu alati olemas. Päriselus Hannes endale latte ei sea, vaid võtab elu mõnusalt. Hannes tutvustab vaatajatele ka oma häid Tartu-sõpru ja mõnusamaid Tartu-kohti. Saatejuht Grete Lõbu.(n)

programme.title: Aja laul
programme.desc: Laule esitavad Andres Dvinjaninov, Jüri Lumiste, Hannes Kaljujärv, Toomas Lunge ja Indrek Kalda. Režissöör Peeter Brambat.(n)

programme.title: Uhuu eksirännakud
Shooom's Odyssey
programme.desc: Väike öökullipoeg koorub munast just siis, kui ümberringi puhkeb suur torm, mis paiskab ümber ka tema pesapuu. Pisike tibu võtab kaasa pesast kukkunud muna ja asub vapralt ohte trotsides teele, et leida üles ema - olgu see siis, kes tahes, sobib ka alligaator või pesukaru!(n)

programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Seekord päästavad turbod iidse soolakaevanduse üleujutusest ja päästeoperatsiooni käigus ka Vanameister Vussi friikad läbiligunemisest!(n)

programme.title: Tagasi Prostokvašinos
programme.desc: Vana-aastaõhtu on käes, ema ja isa oodatakse juba pikisilmi Prostokvašinosse, et koos uut aastat vastu võtta.(n)

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara ja Part lähevad kalu vaatama ning satuvad juhuslikult peale kalade võidukihutamisele.(n)

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: "Mängime arsti!" on vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ja näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ning sümptomite avaldumisvorme.(n)

programme.title: Lotte lood
programme.desc: Leiutajateküla Lotte on sellega tegelikult harjunud, et iga päev juhtub midagi huvitavat. Ja mitte üks või kaks, vaid mõnikord isegi kümme põnevat asja päevas. Aga mõni neist on nii ootamatu, et tagantjärele ei usuks ise ka, kui poleks seda kõike oma silmaga näinud. Täna panevad plehku pannkoogid nii rännukoer Klausi taldrikult kui ka koolitoa aknalaualt. Autorid Andrus Kivirähk, Janno Põldma ja Heiki Ernits, lavastas Ain Mäeots, režissöör on Elo Selirand, Lotte - Helena Pruuli, Bruno - Priit Strandberg, Albert - Vallo Kirs, Klaus - Margus Tabor, Ruudi - Tiit Sukk jpt.(n)

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Linnapea palub Ernestil pidulikul puhul "Karulaulu" esitada, ent Ernestil läheb ootamatult hääl ära. Koos Celestine'iga nuputavad nad, kes võiks teda nii kähku asendada.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Petter paneb üles video Martini perekonnast ja vaatajaid on murdu. Petteri arvates võiks Martin oma populaarsust ära kasutada ja kellessegi teise armuda.(n)

programme.title: Marakratt Bennie
Bennie Stout
programme.desc: Bennie polegi tegelikult paha poiss, aga tahab näida paha, et Must Peeter ta kotti paneks ja Hispaaniasse viiks. Bennie isa on nimelt Hispaanias tööl.(n)

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Kilpkonnamuna omlett. Mis sellest saab ja kas üldse saab. Arutame saapaasju. Kergekujuline kuumarabandus. Metsaloodusemees Romet Vaino ja tema teistsugune vaade loodusele. Ebamaine kogemus Nõmbra suitsusauna, lillevanni ja metsarestoraniga. Lisaks looduse ja matkatarkusi ning palju muud. Operaatorid Manuel Mägi ja Lemo, sarja autor Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Poldarkid loodavad Cornwallis rahu leida, kuid Rossi vana sõbra Ned Despardi ootamatu palve peale tuleb Rossil tagasi Londonisse minna. George’il on raske ilma Elizabethita hakkama saada. Demelzal tekib Cornwallis uus vastane.(n)

programme.title: Oravalood
Going Nuts – Tales from the Squirrel World
programme.desc: Oravad on meie planeedi üks edukamaid liike. Võime neid kohata linnades, mägedes, kõrbetes, vihmametsades ja isegi Arktikas. Mõned oravad oskavad lennata, teised ujuda, ühed elavad puu otsas, teised maa all, kolmandad tundras ja neljandad hoopis kõrvetavkuumas kõrbes. Film tutvustabki meile oravate mitmekesist maailma.(n)

programme.title: Kihnu lapsed
Engel, Rasmus ning..
programme.desc: Kolde Engel ja Läänemetsa Rasmus aitavad kosklapoegadel merre pääseda. Kosklaid on kihnlased pidanud omatehtud kongides aastasadu. Linnud munevad rohkem mune kui suudavad ise välja haududa. Munade ülejääk on üüritasuks inimestele, kes lindudele majakesi ehitavad ja linde vaenlaste eest kaitsevad. Rasmuse vanaisale teevad muret üleilmne vägivald ja sallimatus inimeste ning riikide vahel. Taadi lahkumist teise ilma oleks lastel väga raske üle elada, kui metsad ei heliseks edasi linnulaulust...(n)

programme.title: Hämmastavad sead
Amazing Pigs
programme.desc: Räpased, rumalad, ahned ja laisad? Tegelikult on sead ülimalt intelligentsed, tundlike meeltega loomad, kes suudavad kohaneda peaaegu kõigi keskkondadega. Film viib üllatavale ja lõbusale retkele Indoneesia auravatest džunglitest kuni Siberi jäiste avarusteni, et avastada nende hämmastavate olendite edu saladusi.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Selles osas saavad Chris ja Xand omal nahal tunda, kuidas temperatuur keha mõjutab ning proovivad valedetektorit eksitada. EMO-sse satuvad patsiendid, kellest ühel on kummaline kõhuvalu ja teine vigastas kukkudes jalga.(n)

programme.title: Uhuu eksirännakud
Shooom's Odyssey
programme.desc: Väike öökullipoeg koorub munast just siis, kui ümberringi puhkeb suur torm, mis paiskab ümber ka tema pesapuu. Pisike tibu võtab kaasa pesast kukkunud muna ja asub vapralt ohte trotsides teele, et leida üles ema - olgu see siis, kes tahes, sobib ka alligaator või pesukaru!(n)

programme.title: Peeter Paani uued seiklused
programme.desc: Mereröövlid võtavad Tiigerliilia kinni, kuid kaks maskeeritud meest vabastavad tüdruku: selgub, et saarel on uued kangelased, El Crocheto ja tema ustav teener El Mosquito. Peeter otsustab Michaelit ära kasutada, et salapärane kangelane paljastada.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Koolivaheajal vaatame üle hooaja kõige lemmikumad lood! Oleme sel nädalal eetris hommikul kell 8.30 ja pärastlõunal kell 16.45. Saad meile oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Sarja toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Lotte lood
programme.desc: Leiutajateküla Lotte on sellega tegelikult harjunud, et iga päev juhtub midagi huvitavat. Ja mitte üks või kaks, vaid mõnikord isegi kümme põnevat asja päevas. Aga mõni neist on nii ootamatu, et tagantjärele ei usuks ise ka, kui poleks seda kõike oma silmaga näinud. Täna panevad plehku pannkoogid nii rännukoer Klausi taldrikult kui ka koolitoa aknalaualt. Autorid Andrus Kivirähk, Janno Põldma ja Heiki Ernits, lavastas Ain Mäeots, režissöör on Elo Selirand, Lotte - Helena Pruuli, Bruno - Priit Strandberg, Albert - Vallo Kirs, Klaus - Margus Tabor, Ruudi - Tiit Sukk jpt.(n)

programme.title: Lohe Zog
Zog
programme.desc: Zog on väike lohe, kellel ei lähe koolis üldse hästi - tal ei õnnestu lennata, tuld pursata ega üldse midagi, mida lohed peaksid oskama. Ometi tahaks ta nii väga õpetajalt kiita saada.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Petter paneb üles video Martini perekonnast ja vaatajaid on murdu. Petteri arvates võiks Martin oma populaarsust ära kasutada ja kellessegi teise armuda.(n)

programme.title: Lumekuninganna
Snežnaja koroleva
programme.desc: Hans Christian Anderseni muinasjutu ainetel loodud vene kinoklassika multifilm viib meid pikale teekonnale, et vabastada väike poiss Lumekuninganna jäisest haardest. Gerdat varitseb kõikjal hädaoht, kui ta üritab lahendada Kaj kadumise mõistatust. Kas sõpruse soojus saavutab võidu külma kurjuse üle või jääb Lumekuninganna igavesti valitsema?(n)

programme.title: Puuonni lood
programme.desc: Lapsed murravad pead, kas vahel võib väiksem suuremast jagu saada.(n)

programme.title: Salme viikingid
programme.desc: Värske dokumentaalsari Salme Viikingid toob vaatajate ette mõistatuse, mis 2008. aastal Saaremaal, Salme koolimaja juurest maapõuest leiti. Omanäolises kombinatsioonis maetud viikingiaegsed inimluud ja rikkalikud hauapanused pöörasid kogu maailma viikingiaja uurijate pilgud Saaremaale. Kes seal hauas lebavad, kes nad sinna matsid ja mis seal 1300 aastat tagasi juhtus? Teadlased on nendele küsimustele viimased 13 aastat vastuseid otsinud ja on nüüd valmis leitut ka meiega jagama. Esimeses osas sukeldume pea ees aastatuhande taha ja teeme selgeks, mis aeg see viikingiaeg üldse oli. Režissöör Liis Lindmaa, toimetaja Sigrid Salutee, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja ULM Production.(n)

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Pikad päikesevalgust täis päevad hakkavad otsa saama. Ricko DeWilde läheb jahile, et talveks liha varuda, Jessie Holmes jookseb ajaga võidu, et ehitustöid enne sügist lõpetada.(n)

programme.title: Aegluubis maailm
programme.desc: Olles külastanud maailma pikima nimega linna ja jõudnud seejärel Uus-Meremaa pealinna Wellingtoni, sõidavad reisisellid Lõunasaarele Franz Josefi nimelisse väikelinna. Sealt lennatakse helikopteriga Foxi liustikule, mis on üks väheseid vihmametsa ulatuvaid liustikke.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Aafrika
programme.desc: Sarja kolmandas osas jätkub automatk mööda Maroko ja Lääne-Sahara teid ning huvitavaid paiku. Ööbime kõrbesse peitunud uhkes lossis, kohtume toredat nime kandva laevaga, uurime kalurielu Dakhla linna agulites ja jõuame lõpuks välja uude riiki – Mauritaniasse, kus ootavad meid ees hoopis teistsugune turvalisuseolukord ning hiiglaslik laevade surnuaed. Mägimatkajad on vahepeal jõudnud Meru vulkaani baaslaagrisse ja alustavad järgmist hästiturvatud ning abilisterohket tõusu järgmisesse olulisse mägilaagrisse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Kolm tenorit. Caracallast maailmale
Three Tenors - from Caracalla to the World
programme.desc: Maailmakuulsad tenorid Luciano Pavarotti, Placido Domingo ja José Carreras andsid 30 aastat tagasi Roomas ülimenuka ühise kontserdi, mille ülekannet jälgisid 1,6 miljonit inimest üle terve maakera. Filmis meenutavad korraldajad kontserdi sünnilugu ja selle eredamaid hetki. Seni avaldamata videokaadrid lava tagant heidavad uut valgust ühele 20. sajandi kuulsaimale muusikasündmusele, kuuleme kolme staari omavahelistest suhetest, sõprusest ja rivaalitsemisest. Filmis kõlab sel kontserdil esitatud kaunis muusika.(n)

programme.title: Metslased
programme.desc: Kilpkonnamuna omlett. Mis sellest saab ja kas üldse saab. Arutame saapaasju. Kergekujuline kuumarabandus. Metsaloodusemees Romet Vaino ja tema teistsugune vaade loodusele. Ebamaine kogemus Nõmbra suitsusauna, lillevanni ja metsarestoraniga. Lisaks looduse ja matkatarkusi ning palju muud. Operaatorid Manuel Mägi ja Lemo, sarja autor Lemo, tootja Tootmisguru OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: Jupiter Jones finds her ordinary life turned upside down, when she discovers that she's an heiress of intergalactic nobility and together with an ex-military hunter must fight to save Earth from a destructive force.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: As the last son of Krypton sent to Earth, a young journalist raised by his adoptive parents finds the fate of planet Earth in his hands after an attack. From the writer of "The Dark Knight," director of "300," and producer Christopher Nolan comes this epic Superman reboot.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: After his restored faith in humanity and his inspiration by Superman’s neglection to himself, Batman unites with Princess Diana to defeat the strong villain.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In the near future, Wade Watts, an outcast young man tries to escape his daily horror by joining an online game called Oasis. When the game’s billionaire founder dies, his fortune is offered to the players as a prize for achieving a certain level in the game. Five years after joining the game, Watts finds himself facing off against corporate foes in both real life and in the game.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time-travelling Temporal Agent who must ensure sustaining his career throughout eternity, has to face the one criminal who has eluded him throughout time.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: During a mission to reach a habitable planet for humans, the crew of a space ship receives a radio transmission that guides them to a nearby planet. But their hopes to find a home in that planet are quickly dashed when they encounter an alien species out of their darkest nightmares.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In the near future, Wade Watts, an outcast young man tries to escape his daily horror by joining an online game called Oasis. When the game’s billionaire founder dies, his fortune is offered to the players as a prize for achieving a certain level in the game. Five years after joining the game, Watts finds himself facing off against corporate foes in both real life and in the game.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: Based on the comic book series (Valerian and Laureline), Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets revolves around Valerian (Dane Dettan) and Laureline (Cara Delevingne), a team of special operatives who time travel on a mission to find and explore the galaxy's empire.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time-travelling Temporal Agent who must ensure sustaining his career throughout eternity, has to face the one criminal who has eluded him throughout time.

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Set in 1869, President Ulysses Grant teams up Special Agent Jim West with inventive US Marshal Artemus Gordon to stop the threats imposed on them at the hands of the psychotic Dr. Arliss Loveless and his diabolical machines.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: When (Chris Brander) decides to take the next step in his relationship with (Jamie), but she only wants them to be friends, he goes to Los Angeles and becomes an attractive guy who works in the music industry. He travels with a new singer (Samantha) till he returns to his home town.

programme.title: A Case of You
programme.desc: Sam Newman, a writer, fails to get the girl of his dreams. He claims to be an athletic, courageous and charismatic person on social media to change his luck and succeeds in his plan and attracts his dream girl Birdie. Sam pretended to be someone else whenever around Birdie and eventually had to tell her the truth before it was too late.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: The romance between Rachel and Nick faces an unexpected hurdle when Nick takes Rachel to his home in Singapore to attend his best friend's wedding, only for Rachel to discover that she is dating the heir of one of the wealthiest families in Singapore, a family that judges her unfit for their son.

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: When his self-destructive behavior leaves his career circling the drain, a chef looks for a fresh start in trying to assemble a team of top-notch chefs in order to achieve his dream of starting a restaurant worthy of three Michelin stars.

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: After two people make an online connection that leads to a one-night stand, they wake up to find themselves snowed in after sleeping through a blizzard that put all of Manhattan on ice. They have to extend their first night and turn it into a two-night stand.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.

programme.title: Predestination
programme.desc: A time-travelling Temporal Agent who must ensure sustaining his career throughout eternity, has to face the one criminal who has eluded him throughout time.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: A teleportation device is found in Egypt, and Scientist Daniel discovers that it transmits him to another planet where humans resemble the ancient Egyptians who worship the God Ra.

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: The story is about Mickey (Jennifer Aniston), the wife of corrupt businessman Frank (Tim Robbins), who gets kidnapped by criminals who extorted her husband and demanded a ransom. Things go against the expected.(n)

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective and an American gambler form a team to hunt down a Chinese criminal.(n)

programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: A strict cop is on a mission to tame the widow of a drug boss, tracking her on the run through Texas, while simultaneously being deviated by corrupt police officers and armed thugs.(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Auggie, a kid who was born with facial differences, goes to a mainstream elementary school for the first time. There, his family, community and classmates all struggle with their acceptance and compassion towards him. He unites them all with his fascinating journey where he shows that you can’t fit in if you were born to stand out. Auggie, a kid who was born with facial differences, goes to a mainstream elementary school for the first time. There, his family, community and classmates all struggle with their acceptance and compassion towards him. He unites them all with his fascinating journey where he shows that you can’t fit in if you were born to stand out.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: The 11-year-old Anna Fitzgerald enlists the help of a lawyer to earn medical release from her parents, who want her to donate her kidney to save the life of her elder sister Kate who has leukemia.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A group of famous illusionists called the "Four Horsemen" are being chased by an FBI agent and an Interpol detective after they pull off major bank heists during their performances and shower the audience with money.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft's father goes missing after he sets off to find the ancient dagger of Xian. She goes looking for him on an exotic Chinese island. Croft assigns her father’ old friend, Lu Ren as her guide on the island, but they have to deal with the consequences of their disastrous journey and find themselves trying to survive.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Tuck and Frank (Tom Hardy and Chris Pine) are two best friends and CIA agents. They fall in love with the same girl, Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). She's confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her.

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: When his lover Kiriko is murdered, the young ninja Raizo turns his back on the orphanage that raised him and exacts his vengeance on those who killed her.

programme.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
programme.desc: Audrey and Morgan, are two best friends in their thirties who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when Audery's ex-boyfriend suddenly shows up at their apartment with a team of deadly assassins on his trail.

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Finn and his ex-wife Tess embark on a treasure hunt that rekindles the flames of their love.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In the world of magic and optical illusions, the Four Horsemen face a tech genius who tries to exploit them, and they must clear their names before society and reveal the truth through one last stunt.

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A super hero works for civil security in Los Angeles, and due to his recklessness causes millions of dollars worth of damages which he then tries to make up for by improving his image.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill finds himself chased by Ronan (Lee Pace) after stealing a mysterious orb. In order to evade Ronan, Peter must work with Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Rocket (Bradley Cooper), Drax (Dave Bautista) and Groot (Vin Diesel). Peter soon discovers the true power of the orb and the danger it poses to the entire universe.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A group of humans who survived a devastating virus that has struck the planet a decade earlier, are at peace with genetically evolved apes led by Caesar. Proven fragile, peace is broken and a war begins between both sects that will determine who will dominate Earth.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill finds himself chased by Ronan (Lee Pace) after stealing a mysterious orb. In order to evade Ronan, Peter must work with Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Rocket (Bradley Cooper), Drax (Dave Bautista) and Groot (Vin Diesel). Peter soon discovers the true power of the orb and the danger it poses to the entire universe.(n)

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.(n)

programme.title: Insurgent
programme.desc: Beatrice Prior must go on saving the ones she loves and confront her inner demons to fight against a powerful alliance that is threatening her society.(n)

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: When her brother is sentenced to life in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Betty Anne Waters goes through the ultimate struggle to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: Won't Back Down
programme.desc: Two strong-willed mothers seek to make a difference at the school where their children attend, by confronting the powerful bureaucracy within the school’s system.(n)

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: In the 1970s, the film revolves around the life of television reporter Christine Chubbuck, who suffered from depression while trying to advance in her career.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Her
programme.desc: A story told from a female perspective, about the couple Eleanor and Conor, who are trying to restore their lives which was full of love, reconcile their distant past and their relationship into the right direction.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him
programme.desc: A romance story about the couple Connor and Eleanor, living in New York, their love seems to be perfect, till they find themselves in a dangerous slope, as if they do not know each other. They try picking up the pieces of their old love,to face the new changes, will they succeed in that.(n)

programme.title: My Mom's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Young FBI agent Henry Durand finds himself assigned to a tough task when he has to monitor his mother's boyfriend, who is an international art thief posing as a consultant.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: The story offers original tale that have been said about the bitter conflict between humans and Orcs, addressing through the events the conflict occurred between the two sides.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but in order to do so, he needs to find an artifact, which is on Earth.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to stop Memnon from taking over the world, the leaders of the remaining free tribes hire the assassin Mathayus to kill Cassandra, whom Menmon depends on to foretell his great victoies.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Echo Boomers
programme.desc: In an attempt to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted, a group of college graduates goes on a destructive spree as they rob Chicago's richest while sending a message to the world.

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers and their allies continue to protect the world from the threats that cannot be dealt with alone. Thanos, a new tyrant from the cosmic shadows, spreads wrongdoing between galaxies; and his goal is to collect the six infinite stones to reach an unlimited force.

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) faces the consequences of his choices as a superhero and a father; as he struggles to re-balance his domestic life while assuming his responsibilities as Ant-Man. He’s also confronted by Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) and Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) with an urgent new mission.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner is assigned with stopping a group of car-hijackers led by Dominic Toretto. However, he gets enamored with the street-racing society, and he has to decide where does his loyalty lie.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss, dragging Nick into the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In 1985, when a superhero ( the Comedian) die in mysterious circumstances, his colleague (Rorschach) attempts to uncover the circumstances of this crime. Little by little, old comrades meet again in the face of an unknown danger.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Ten years after X-Men: Days of Future Past, during the 1980s, Professor X, Magneto and Mystique find themselves uniting against a looming common enemy, Apocalypse, recently resurrected and planning to strike.(n)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.(n)

programme.title: Joshua Tree
programme.desc: As Wellman Santee manages to break out of prison, trouble begins when he, unbeknownst to him, kidnaps a female police officer on his way to take revenge on the corrupt cop who put him under lock and key.(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.(n)

programme.desc: Ten years after X-Men: Days of Future Past, during the 1980s, Professor X, Magneto and Mystique find themselves uniting against a looming common enemy, Apocalypse, recently resurrected and planning to strike.(n)

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt retires from training, but is asked to return to work again to face an international arms dealer. Ethan reunites his team to carry out a new mission while keeping his wife safe who becomes at risk during the operation.

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.

programme.desc: The film takes a look at the life of painter Vincent Van Gogh during the time he lived in his French exile, where he worked to develop his artistic sense, fighting his inner demons, and strengthening his bond with his friend French artist Paul Gauguin.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: When Robin Cavendish is struck down by polio at the age of 28, he is confined to the hospital as most of his body parts are paralyzed and he is given only a few months to live. However, as he defeats his disability and recovers, he devotes his life to help other polio patients.

programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.

programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the American Civil War; a mysterious gunslinger reluctantly joins a Mexican desperado to find a buried treasure, while they seek to get the better of an outlaw who's trying to beat them to the money.

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman, an employee of the insurance company, lives a normal life, in which the same situations are repeated on a daily basis. Despite his quiet life with his beautiful wife, Truman always feels something is missing. Truman wants to travel and roam the world, but obstacles always stand in his way. Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: Pat Solitano, a hothead with bipolar disorder, is fresh out of a mental institution and has to move back home with his parents. His plans for getting his life back on track get derailed when he meets the equally eccentric and neurotic Tiffany.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone,the head of one of the five mafia families in New York, doesn't want his younger son Michael to get involved in the life of organized crime. Michael feels the same, but things change when negotiations fail between the family of Don Corleone and other families about the distribution of drugs.

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: After he survives an assassination attempt in Sweden, the contract killer Jack flees to Rome where he is hired to build a custom sniper rifle for a client, as he vows that this will be his last job.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: The true story of middleweight boxer Jake LaMotta, through the boxing rings, the violence and mob, and his temper that made him a boxing champion, but pushed his family away.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the American Civil War; a mysterious gunslinger reluctantly joins a Mexican desperado to find a buried treasure, while they seek to get the better of an outlaw who's trying to beat them to the money.

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Shy student Todd Anderson attends the school where his older brother was famous along with his roommate Neil Perry. They meet John Keating, the new English teacher who creates a club called The Dead Poets Society,through which he tries to help his students restore balance in their lives.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: In this sequel, the G.I Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Wigand, an official at one of the largest tobacco companies, is faced with tough choices, either revealing dangerous secrets of the Tobacco industry through the TV program "60 Minutes", threatening to jeopardize his health insurance and family conditions, or to remain silent and violating his conscience.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: The biography of mathematician John Forbes Nash, Jr. (Russell Crowe) since he was a university student, through his academic work and research achievements, his love story with his student Alicia (Jennifer Connelly) who became his wife and his bitter struggle with paranoid schizophrenia.

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: The events begin during the trip to New York with Harry and Sally. Harry planned to start working in a wide-ranging institution. Meanwhile, Sally had planned to attend journalism, and their relationship would start through a dispute over their accidental meeting, and their relationship would evolve over time.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: In Fargo, Minnesota, car salesman Jerry Lundegaard hires two men to kidnap his wife for a $ 1 million ransom paid by his wealthy father-in-law, but the plan gets complicated causing a series of heinous murders.

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Carlito is sentenced five years in prison. Later on he repents his crimes and becomes a straight person, but everyone around him tries to get him back to break the law. Among those are his nephew who commits a crime and asks him to cover it up, as well as a group of gangsters who believe he murdered their leader, and are trying to take revenge on him. He must take care of all those troubles before starting a new life.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Violence and chaos follow a hunter, having found some bodies and a huge amount of heroin, and more than $ 2 million in cash near Rio Grande.

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Wigand, an official at one of the largest tobacco companies, is faced with tough choices, either revealing dangerous secrets of the Tobacco industry through the TV program "60 Minutes", threatening to jeopardize his health insurance and family conditions, or to remain silent and violating his conscience.

programme.title: Sleepover
programme.desc: Four best friends who decide to cast off their reputation as a group of nerds and enter an all-night scavenger against the clique of the 'popular' girls at school, turning a sleepover party into the adventure of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Zookeeper
programme.desc: When the zookeeper decides to quit winning back his ex-girlfriend, the animals try to teach him the ways of love.(n)

programme.title: Logan Lucky
programme.desc: Two siblings try as hard as they can to steal a car at a big Nascar race in South Carolina.(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: The 25-year-old Josie agrees to go undercover to return to high school in order to write a story about the high school scene. But as memories of her less-than-ideal time in school come to surface, she finds herself falling for a teacher as she clashes with the resident mean girls.(n)

programme.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: A group of British retired seniors plan a trip to India for rest and recreation in a luxury Hotel, they discover that the hotel is not as advertised. But manage to find beauty and magic in an unexpected way.(n)

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: As Aaron and Ryan make preparations for their father's funeral, chaos slowly start to happen when nothing at all goes according to plan. While Aaron and his wife still live in their parents house, Ryan is a successful writer but doesn't help out his brother.(n)

programme.title: Arthur Newman
programme.desc: A man who's sick of his life fakes his own death and takes the identity of a man named Arthur Newman. He runs into Mike, a woman who's also running away from her past. They start breaking into homes and taking the identities of the absent owners.(n)

programme.title: American Pie Presents: Girls' Rules
programme.desc: As Annie, Kayla, Michelle, and Stephanie are in their senior year at school, each one has her own romance issues to deal with, until the arrival of the handsome guy Grant leads them all to try to win his affection.(n)

Two and a Half Men S4
Love Song
programme.desc: After both Duke Sterling and Grady Connor agree on musical collaboration, a dispute arises between them over songwriting, which makes Connor's manager persuade him to write one song for Duke to participate in a music festival, and there Connor gets to meet the country singer Shayna.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: A young man seeks to become an MMA fighter like his estranged father, all the while struggling not to get carried away with violence like him.

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.

programme.title: Love in Design
programme.desc: With the ratings for her home renovation TV show in decline, Hannah is robbed into returning to her hometown to take on a new job that will take her show in a new direction: restoring a historical manor. Assigned to oversee her work is architect Jeff, who just happens to be her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

programme.title: Let Him Go
programme.desc: The life of a retired sheriff and his wife takes a tragic turn when their only son passes away. Grief-stricken and unable to shake off their sense of loss, they set out on a journey to find their grandson.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Villain
programme.desc: The ex-criminal Eddie Franks attempts to get his life back on track, as he reconnects with his daughter and pays his brother's debt. But he soon finds his past catching up with him when he gets embroiled in his old life once again.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Based on a true story; a retelling of the negotiations that took place against the backdrop of the Oslo Peace Accords in the 1990s between the Palestinian Liberation Organization and the government of Israel in which Norway acted as an intermediary.

programme.title: Secrets in the Basement
programme.desc: A blissful couple, Delilah and Shawn, moves to a new house in the suburbs, unaware of the fact that the house's basement is the dwelling of a sinister masked figure.(n)

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.(n)

programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.(n)

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Bodyguard Michael Bryce finds himself embroiled in a new dangerous mission, as he teams up with hitman Darius Kincaid and his wife Sonia in order to thwart a cyberattack in Europe.(n)

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2015 film (Sicario), where the drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border.(n)

programme.desc: In this new chapter in the book of SAW, Detective Zeke Banks and his partner are investigating a series of murders that bear strong similarities to the gruesome crimes carried out by the evil Jigsaw, as Zeke becomes trapped in the killer's sick game.(n)

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: When horrific murders occur one after the other, some people start to think that the myth Golem is the cause for all these misfortunes.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: Dana's attempt to bond with her teenage son by taking him camping takes a turn when she clashes with the man in the cabin next to them, himself a father trying to reconnect with his daughter. But the conflict soon turns into romance as sparks fly between the two single parents.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits
programme.desc: Chloe lives a quiet life with her teenage daughter Nicole, but things take an unexpected turn when her estranged younger sister Sadie enters their lives after a long absence, as Chloe begins to realize that Sadie's intentions are not as innocent as they may seem.

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery
programme.desc: Hailey Dean, who was working in the attorney general's office, decides to quit her job to work as a counselor in marital affairs and a psychiatrist.

programme.title: The House On Carroll Street

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: A new student must find someone to date the most depressing girl in school, in order to take her little sister, who he likes, on a date, who's not allowed to date anyone till her older sister is on a date first.

programme.title: Appetite for Love
programme.desc: When Mina's work sends her back to her hometown, she must contend with old feelings as her encounters with her former sweetheart Clay, whom she is trying to convince to sell his restaurant, stir old feelings for her.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: In this cop comedy, a very unlikable pair is made when the prickly FBI agent Sarah Ashburn has to team up with a crude Boston cop Shannon Mullins to track down a ruthless drug lord.

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: When her father vanishes after putting their family home on the line, the teenage Ree is left with no choice but to go looking for him in the hopes of saving her family from a grim fate.

programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.

Her opposition husband Joe Wilson writes an article exposing the lie of the US administration, and the authorities avenge him.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A magazine writer's plans for a life of casual sex and no commitment are derailed when she meets a sports doctor and starts to fall for him. She is then forced to reevaluate her way of thinking and the source of the advice that set her on that path.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Dan hooks up with a female editor and maintains a short-lived relationship with her, but that relationship turns into hell when she threatens to reveal their relationship to his wife and friends. Dan tries to deal with her threats and inappropriate behavior in diverse ways.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A family moves into a small town,where an animal cemetery is behind the house. When the son dies from a truck accident ,the father discovers that the cemetery has power to raise the dead,so he buries his son in it hoping to bring him back to life.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.

programme.title: Jonathan
programme.desc: (Jonathan) leaves the office every day at noon, and when he returns home, he goes to sleep, wakes up every morning, finds his breakfast prepared with a video telling him about the second part of his day.

programme.desc: Phillip, a puppeteer, has a troubled past and a fixation on a creepy puppet that he works with. programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.

programme.desc: A divorced couple, Richard and Kate, puts their differences aside and plots to recover their stolen retirement money from the company owner.
